title: Bug 120922 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improved
description: Bug 120922 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improved. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog is titled 'Error'.
OB: When editing the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and then attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved.
EB: A better and more typical approach would be for the XML Report Designer to prompt the user when there are unsaved changes, using a title that is more descriptive and does not contain quotes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps:
1. Edit the XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor.
2. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view.
3. Observe the error message indicating that the changes need to be saved.
